description: It looks like this would be a helpful application, but I can't get it to start in Ubuntu 18.04. I will give it a higher review if I'm able to get it working and it does what it is supposed to do.
summary: The snap does not launch properly in Ubuntu 18.04

description: It starts fine in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS on my machine... Did you even actually try running it as the screensshot demonstrates very simply.. or even just with the good ol' -h to get the help if you want to make it more complicated than the trivial to emulate screenshot usage..?
